title: DAK: David Alexander Kopelman

abstract: Step inside DAK's unique world, full of art, surfing and living life "his way". Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Bass Coast'.
description: yDAK doesn't consider himself an artist, he just "dabbles and makes stuff". Despite this his scrap-metal sculptures and decorative gates can be found throughout the neighbourhoods, businesses and galleries of the Bass Coast in south-eastern Victoria. Cape Woolamai’s very own mo-hawked road warrior has a plasma cutter and he’s not afraid to use it!
